npcSpeech.text: I've failed, I've failed... what will Presbyter say... Oh! You're here! Jane is up ahead. I tried making her go away but she was sure you would come here. Good luck... Also remember, don't lie to her. She can sniff a lie from a mile away.
To tell Presbyter that I failed.
GemTech Security is a branch of its own... I don't think he could do anything to stop them... Good luck.
Did my advice help? It did didn't it! Yes! This is great news.

response.text: Are you going to go back?

npcSpeech.text: I think I'll stay around a bit longer, till I know you are safe.
I'm sorry... I'm only trying my best.
Presbyter was right... You are special.
